definitions.definition: To imply without a direct statement ; to provide a clue.
examples: She hinted at the possibility of a recount of the votes.

definitions.definition: To bring to mind by a slight mention or remote allusion; to suggest in an indirect manner.
To develop and add hints to a font .
examples: The typographer worked all day on hinting her new font so it would look good on computer screens.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To imply without a direct statement ; to provide a clue.
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To bring to mind by a slight mention or remote allusion; to suggest in an indirect manner.
( transitive ) To develop and add hints to a font .
